trait.name: Description
trait.text: Source: Volo's Guide to Monsters p. 109, Explorer's Guide to Wildemount p. 177

trait.name: Age
trait.text: Kenku have shorter lifespans than humans. They reach maturity at about 12 years old and can live to 60.

trait.name: Alignment
trait.text: Kenku are chaotic creatures, rarely making enduring commitments, and they care mostly for preserving their own hides. They are generally chaotic neutral in outlook.

trait.name: Size
trait.text: Kenku are around 5 feet tall and weigh between 90 and 120 pounds. Your size is Medium.

trait.name: Expert Forgery
trait.text: You can duplicate other creatures' handwriting and craftwork. You have advantage on all checks made to produce forgeries or duplicates of existing objects.

trait.name: Kenku Training
trait.text: You are proficient in your choice of two of the following skills: Acrobatics, Deception, Stealth, and Sleight of Hand.

trait.name: Mimicry
trait.text: You can mimic sounds you have heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful Wisdom (Insight) check opposed by your Charisma (Deception) check.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You can read and write Common and Auran, but you can only speak using your Mimicry trait.
